snippet: With the issue resonating in the presidential campaign, Mrs. Clinton calls for curbing anonymous donations and amplifying the voice of small donors.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton, seizing on issue that has galvanized voters in both parties, proposes campaign finance reforms intended to limit anonymous political donations and increase influence of small donors through federal matching plan; multiprong plan is not elucidated in detail, and could face significant challenges.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

lead_paragraph: With the issue resonating in the presidential campaign, Mrs. Clinton calls for curbing anonymous donations and amplifying the voice of small donors.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Announces Campaign Finance Overhaul Plan
headline.print_headline: With Issue Galvanizing Voters, Clinton Proposes Campaign Finance Reforms

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
